   |

public class ConstantClass
extends Constant
An individual constant in the class file constant pool which describes a class or an interface.

ConstantClass(ClassFile, DataInputStream)
Build a ConstantClass from a data stream
ConstantClass(ClassFile, int)
Build a ConstantClass from an index that refers to a ConstantUtf8 that contains the class name.

getName()
Get the fully qualified name of the Class.
getNameIndex()
Get the index of the ConstantUtf8 that names the class.
